title: King Crimson - In The Court Of (1969) [40th Ann] [24/96 Audio fr
description:
This is the same torrent that was uploaded to Demonoid in September 2011.


King Crimson - In The Court Of The Crimson King (1969) [40th Anniversary] [24/96 Flac Audio from DVD] (4 Albums)

This is not my rip. I found the DVD on Demonoid.

Using the DVD-Audio Explorer program found here: <a href="
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/DVD-Audio_Explorer" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/DVD-Audio_Explorer</a>

http://www.htguide.com/forum/archive/index.php4/t-33033.html</a>

1 - 2009 Stereo Mix:

01. 21st Century Schizoid Man (Including Mirrors)

03. Epitaph (Including March For No Reason/Tomorrow And Tomorrow)
04. Moonchild (Including The Dream/The Illusion)
05. The Court Of The Crimson Song (Including The Return Of The Fire Witch/The Dance Of The Puppets)

2 - Original Master Edition 2004:

01. 21st Century Schizoid Man (Including Mirrors)
02. I Talk To The Wind
03. Epitaph (Including March For No Reason/Tomorrow And Tomorrow)
04. Moonchild (Including The Dream/The Illusion)
05. The Court Of The Crimson Song (Including The Return Of The Fire Witch/The Dance Of The Puppets)

3 - Additional Audio Content:

01. Moonchild (full version)
02. I Talk To The Wind (duo version)
03. I Talk To The Wind (Alternate mix)
04. Epitaph (backing track)
05. Wind Session

4 - The Alternate Album:
